definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
green pest prevention and control/environmentally friendly methods of pest control and prevention
pinyin: bing4 chong2 hai4 lu:4 se4 fang2 kong4

sentences.english: Large-scale control for severe infestations can be achieved by fumigating.
sentences.chinese: 預防大面積嚴重蟲害可採取燻蒸的辦法。

sentences.english: Chemical control will do most of things in pest control.
sentences.chinese: 化學防治能在病蟲害防治中起到主要作用。

sentences.english: At the same time, the response to the climate and pests in Enshi area were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，記錄了它在恩施的物候反應及病蟲害調查結果。

sentences.english: I didn't know when I was siting it that I had a thrips infestation nearby.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道什麼時候我認爲我的選址有薊馬蟲害附近。

sentences.english: Using bio-control approach to control and manage the pest and disease.
sentences.chinese: 利用生物防治法控制園林病蟲害。

sentences.english: The space remote sensing technology is applied to the investigate division of forest pests in the study.
sentences.chinese: 將航天遙感技術運用於森林病蟲害調查區劃中。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the main pest disease of Chestnut in Kunming district.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了昆明地區板栗的主要病蟲害。

sentences.english: Improved living conditions will help prevent new infestations.
sentences.chinese: 改善居住環境將有助於預防蟲害侵擾。

sentences.english: Plant culture area bigger, then the plant disease question are also more.
sentences.chinese: 作物栽培面積越大，則病蟲害的問題也越多。

sentences.english: Incorporating pest-resistant genes into seeds can help restore the balance.
sentences.chinese: 把抗蟲害的基因植入種子可以幫助避免這一損失。

sentences.english: Defense response can be induced in most terrestrial plants after they are attacked by disease and insects.
sentences.chinese: 地球上大多數植物對病蟲害的侵襲具有誘導防禦反應。

sentences.english: No pests, uniformity is good, spend rate.
sentences.chinese: 無病蟲害，整齊度好，上花率高。

sentences.english: Cultivation technology and prevention of Gynura, as well as cure method of disease and pest control are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了紫背天葵的栽培技術及病蟲害防治方法。

sentences.english: The crops suffered from frequent blights.
sentences.chinese: 農作物經常遭受病蟲害。

sentences.english: In the insect pest of balsamine , the mainest is mite, the red spider that often says namely.
sentences.chinese: 在鳳仙花的蟲害中，最主要的是蟎，即常說的紅蜘蛛。

sentences.english: T protein is used in organic agriculture as a non-toxic means of insect pest control.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白是以一種非毒性的方式進行蟲害控制的。

definition: giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
